metadata.title: CVE-2021-3514 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
When using a sync_repl client in 389-ds-base, an authenticated attacker can cause a NULL pointer dereference using a specially crafted query, causing a crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3514` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2
389-ds-base - 1.4.4.11-2
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.4.11-2
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2
python3-lib389 - 1.4.4.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4.11-2').
